name: Super Mario on Scratch 5 - HTML Port
name_original: Super Mario on Scratch 5 - HTML Port
description:
This is Super Mario on Scratch 5 that is now ported to itch.io!

It may take a little while to load.

Here is the game running on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/527947462/

Credits:  

xXNunyaXx on Scratch for the amazing thumbnail and intro art

MusicManJoe on Scratch for a ton of ideas and playtesting

Brad-Games on Scratch for a lot of ideas and playtesting

FunnyAnimatorJimTV on Scratch for helping the warp pipe code, the save system code, and enemy listing code

BILLGATESFAN on Scratch for helping the clone spawning code and feedback

griffpatch on Scratch for the main engine

NightCat28 on Scratch for feedback

zachs23 on Scratch for the music compression

Nintendo for Mario and most of the other characters

Most music owned by Nintendo

In the Final - GaMetal Remix

Super Mario Galaxy - Credits (Re-Orchestrated) - YoshiDude12

Special thanks to -

Grayforz24682 on Scratch for mental support

AzureLightning  on Scratchfor early feedback

Zelda-Animator on Scratch for creative enlightenment

Bigamer123 on Scratch for early playtesting

PaddlerGames on Scratch for early playtesting

CCAnimates on Scratch for Rupert

RobloxNoob101 on Scratch for Gangsta Mario

legobouwer9 on Scratch for Appel

The rest of the game was created by me
